item.name: Amulet of Extraordinary Wisdom
entries: While wearing this amulet, your Wisdom score is 23. The item has no effect on you if your Wisdom without the amulet is equal to or greater than 23.

item.name: Blixt
entries: The staff functions as a {@item +1 wand of the war mage} and as a {@item +2 quarterstaff}.

When you hit with a melee attack using this staff, the target takes an extra {@dice 2d6} lightning damage and it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be pushed in a straight line up to 15 feet away from you.

item.name: Bracelet of Outstanding Charisma
entries: While wearing this bracelet, your Charisma score is 23. The item has no effect on you if your Charisma without the bracelet is equal to or greater than 23.
